TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that summary page report export to word functionality is working as expected.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Word format.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Word format.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Word format.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Ok button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Ok button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Ok button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify the report has been exported.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify report has been exported.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify report has been exported.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify report has been exported.
